name: 3Touch
overview:
Touch Ltd., a software company, provides integrated and unified audio visual and information technology convergence solutions. It offers 3touch ENTERPRISE, a client server based multimedia solution that stores, manages, and controls various presentation and multimedia materials, as well as allows access to and play-out that information; and 3touch Media Editor software, which helps to develop a digital signage playlist. The company also provides 3touch Room Control, a system designed to link to various legacy control solutions and interact with existing or new installs; and 3touch TV network, a video delivery and display system that plays live video either on demand or according to a preset schedule. In addition, it offers 3touch Encoding, which provides various ways to get the live stream on the network; and 3touch Video on Demand Module, a system that streams content through a set-top box, allows viewing in real time, or allows watching it through a software player. Te companyâ€™s solutions are used in various audio visual areas, such as presentation and content management and delivery, interactive whiteboard applications, room control, room booking and management system, automated video conferencing scheduling and setup, equipment and personal computer monitoring, and IPTV/ video on demand and digital signage.

3Touch Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Athlone, Ireland with additional offices in Cambridge, the United Kingdom.
